articles.description: After Liverpool's pulsating draw with Premier League title rivals Manchester City, Phil McNulty discusses five major talking points from the match.
articles.title: The hype is real - five Liverpool v Man City talking points

articles.description: France overpower winless Wales in an eight-try Six Nations thriller in Cardiff with Warren Gatland's side remaining bottom of the table.
articles.title: France overpower Wales in Six Nations thriller

articles.description: Real Madrid move a step closer to regaining Spain's La Liga title, restoring a seven-point lead by beating Rafael Benitez's Celta Vigo.
articles.title: Dominant Madrid move step closer to La Liga title

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy explains the importance of Darwin Nunez and Virgil van Dijk in Liverpool's draw with Manchester City - and their title bid.
articles.title: ‘Monumental’ - how Nunez & Van Dijk make difference to Liverpool's title bid

articles.description: Manager Ange Postecoglou says Tottenham's fans can "get excited" as they thrash 10-man Aston Villa to raise hopes of qualifying for the Champions League.
articles.title: Spurs fans can 'get excited, why not?' - Postecoglou

articles.description: If England's jersey was weighing heavy against Scotland, it was wafer thing against Ireland in their statement victory, writes Matt Dawson.
articles.title: 'Twickenham was jumping because of how England were playing'

articles.description: Paris St-Germain are held to a 2-2 draw by Reims at the Parc des Princes as Kylian Mbappe starts on the bench.
articles.title: Mbappe dropped as PSG draw with Reims

articles.description: England have been "exposed" in India and have some "deep thinking" ahead, according to coach Brendon McCullum.
articles.title: 'Exposed' England have 'thinking' to do - McCullum

articles.description: Nottingham Forest boss Nuno Espirito Santo says Brighton's Jakub Moder should have had a "clear red card" in his side's 1-0 defeat.
articles.title: 'Am I saying something stupid?' - Nuno bemoans VAR

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen maintain their 10-point lead at the top of the Bundesliga with victory against 10-man Wolfsburg.
articles.title: Leverkusen beat Wolfsburg to maintain 10-point lead
